item.title: CVE-2024-38814|2024-10-16T16:59:20.174Z -- n%2Fa -- vmware%20hcx
item.description: An authenticated SQL injection vulnerability in VMware HCX was privately reported to VMware. A malicious authenticated user with non-administrator privileges may be able to enter specially crafted SQL queries and perform unauthorized remote code execution on the HCX manager.Â Updates are available to remediate this vulnerability in affected VMware products.
